name: vault_matters_addPermissions
description: Adds an account as a matter collaborator.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

AddMatterPermissionsRequest.description: Add an account with the permission specified. The role cannot be owner. If an account already has a role in the matter, the existing role is overwritten.

ccMe.description: Only relevant if **sendEmails** is **true**. To CC the requestor in the email message, set to **true**. To not CC requestor, set to **false**.

sendEmails.description: To send a notification email to the added account, set to **true**. To not send a notification email, set to **false**.

MatterPermission.description: Users can be matter owners or collaborators. Each matter has only one owner. All others users who can access the matter are collaborators. When an account is purged, its corresponding MatterPermission resources cease to exist.

accountId.description: The account ID, as provided by the [Admin SDK](https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/).

role.description: The user's role for the matter.
